title: Fleet Solid Support Delivery
one_line_description: After winning the Fleet Solid Support bid, I was responsible for designing several key ship systems.
details: Following the success of the FSS bid, it was time to deliver the project for real.
I remained responsible for the same systems as the bid phase, however needed to take the maturity of the design to a much deeper level.
There was a lot of interdisciplinary integration, especially for key transversal systems such as High Pressure Sea Water.
One of the key differences at this stage was the customer engagement. I had to demonstrate to the MoD that my systems were robust, to standard and met their bespoke set of needs.
responsibilities_preamble: For the FSS Delivery I was responsible for the following systems:
responsibilities: High Pressure Sea Water (Ship wide distribution of sea water for fire fighting.
Chilled Water (Ship wide distribution of chilled water for weapons systems and air conditioning
Pre-wetting (External ship spray system for Chemical, Biological, Nuclear and Radioactive threats)
